line.comment: * if target is in same sector and aj jumps is 0
* bestgate in this case is the jump to point

* Addition by Rocketman. Allows a direct jump to any Huge Class ship with a jump beacon in inventory. May not work correctly OOS if Multiple Huge Class ships are on top of each other. Requires modified !move.jump as well.
* Modified by temetvince to apply only to TL class ships, to find multiple ships with infinite distance, and to choose the closest one
* checking if gate, beacon, or sector center is actually farther
* away from our target IF we are in the same sector.

sval.val: if target is in same sector and aj jumps is 0
bestgate in this case is the jump to point

Addition by Rocketman. Allows a direct jump to any Huge Class ship with a jump beacon in inventory. May not work correctly OOS if Multiple Huge Class ships are on top of each other. Requires modified !move.jump as well.
Modified by temetvince to apply only to TL class ships, to find multiple ships with infinite distance, and to choose the closest one
checking if gate, beacon, or sector center is actually farther
away from our target IF we are in the same sector.
